message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll offer it to you for $105.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
